document.full_text: the parent company of the ufc, long the dominant force in mixed martial arts, has purchased the rival promoter strikeforce, although strikeforce will continue to operate as a separate entity.
document.title: sports briefing | mixed martial arts: u.f.c. buys rival promoter
lines_and_colors: the parent company of the ufc, long the dominant force in mixed martial arts, has purchased the rival promoter strikeforce, although strikeforce will continue to operate as a separate entity.
